pageContext.claim: “His so-called Biden Center at the University of Pennsylvania has already received $70 million from China, 70 million.”
pageContext.analysis: A conservative organization filed a complaint with the Education Department making this claim. But the donations that it claims were from China are to the University itself, not specifically the Penn Biden Center. University spokesperson Stephen MacCarthy denied the validity of the complaint, calling the allegations “completely untrue.” MacCarthy wrote in a statement to The Daily Pennsylvanian: “We have never solicited any gifts for the Penn Biden Center. Since its inception in 2017, there have been three unsolicited gifts, from two donors, which combined [to a total of] $1,100. Neither of the donors [was] from China."
